purpose.summary: This copybook defines the PADFLPCB group structure (line 17), which maps an IMS Database Program Communication Block (DBPCB) used in COBOL programs for IMS DL/I database access. It includes standard DBPCB fields such as DBD name (line 18), segment level (line 19), PCB status (line 20), processing options (line 21), segment name (line 23), key feedback details (lines 24-26), and a key feedback buffer (line 26). As a copybook, it provides data definitions for IMS PCB handling and contains no executable logic.
purpose.business_context: IMS hierarchical database interface for mainframe applications performing DL/I calls (GU, GN, ISRT, etc.)

open_questions.question: What is the exact IMS database (DBD) or PSB associated with PADFLPCB?
open_questions.context: The PADFL- prefix suggests a specific database or application context, but not determinable from this copybook alone.
open_questions.suggestion: Examine programs that COPY this book or associated PSB/DBD definitions.

open_questions.question: Precise byte offsets and full compliance with IMS DBPCB layout?
open_questions.context: FILLER at line 22 and PIC S9(05) COMP fields approximate standard layout but may have custom sizing.
open_questions.suggestion: Cross-reference with IMS/ESA manuals or dump of populated PCB.
